## DbrpsAPI.postDBRP() method

Add a database retention policy mapping. See [https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.4/api/\#operation/PostDBRP](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.4/api/#operation/PostDBRP)

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
